extends Bluetooth

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connectToLIDAR()
      Attempts to connect to the LIDAR device and open a Bluetooth Socket.
      int getBluetoothBytePacketSize()
      Returns the size, in bytes, from which each chunk of data will be sent from the LIDAR to the phone.
      java.net.URI getFileURI()
      Returns the location of the specified output file for LIDAR data.
      int getIntensityThresholdFilter()
      Returns the intensity threshold which is used to filter out intensity values which are lower than the specified threshold value.
      int getLidarViewRefreshRate()
      Returns the configured refresh rate for the LidarDisplay view invalidate call.
      int getMaximumDistanceFilter()
      Returns the maximum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured more than the specified value.
      int getMinimumDistanceFilter()
      Returns the minimum distance filter value which is used to ignore distance measured less than the specified value.
      int getPollingInterval()
      Returns the rate at which the bluetooth inputstream is checked for available data.
      int getRpmThreshold() 
      boolean isOutputLIDARDataToLog()
      Returns true if the LIDAR object is configured to output to the log.
      boolean isWriteLidarDataToFile()
      Returns true if the LIDAR data is set to be output to a file.
      boolean setBluetoothBytePacketSize(int bluetoothBytePacketSize)
      Sets the size, in bytes, from which each chunk of data will be sent from the LIDAR to the phone.
      void setIntensityThresholdFilter(int intensityThreshold)
      Set the intensity threshold which is used to filter out intensity values which are lower than the specified threshold value.
      void setLidarViewRefreshRate(int lidarViewRefreshRate)
      Set the rate at which invalidate is called on the LidarDisplay view.
      boolean setMaximumDistanceFilter(int maximumDistanceFilter)
      Sets the maximum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured more than the specified value.
      boolean setMinimumDistanceFilter(int minimumDistanceFilter)
      Sets the minimum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured less than the specified value.
      void setOutputLIDARDataToLog(boolean outputLIDARDataToLog)
      Sets the LIDAR data to output to the log.
      void setPollingInterval(int pollingInterval)
      Set the rate at which the bluetooth inputstream is checked for available data.
      void setRpmThreshold(int rpmThreshold) 
      void setWriteLidarDataToFile(java.net.URI fileLocation)
      Sets the location of the file which will be written to for LIDAR data output.
      void startLIDAR()
      Start capturing data with the LIDAR device, reading from the bluetooth inputstream, and updating any output specified (logs, file, LidarDisplay).
      void stopLIDAR()
      Send a stop command to the LIDAR device.

        public void setOutputLIDARDataToLog(boolean outputLIDARDataToLog)
        Sets the LIDAR data to output to the log. Pass true for outputting to the log. False for not outputting LIDAR data to the log.
        Parameters:
        outputLIDARDataToLog - Boolean value for setting LIDAR output to the log.

      • setMinimumDistanceFilter

        public boolean setMinimumDistanceFilter(int minimumDistanceFilter)
        Sets the minimum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured less than the specified value. Returns true if the minimum distance was set correctly.
        Parameters:
        minimumDistanceFilter - Minimum Distance.
        Returns:
        Success.

      • getMaximumDistanceFilter

        public int getMaximumDistanceFilter()
        Returns the maximum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured more than the specified value. Returns true if the maximum distance was set correctly.
        Returns:
        The maximum distance filter value.

        public boolean setMaximumDistanceFilter(int maximumDistanceFilter)
        Sets the maximum distance filter value which is used to ignore distances measured more than the specified value. Returns true if the maximum distance was set correctly.

        Returns:

      • getBluetoothBytePacketSize

        public int getBluetoothBytePacketSize()
        Returns the size, in bytes, from which each chunk of data will be sent from the LIDAR to the phone.
        Returns:
        The size, in bytes, of each chunk of data sent from the LIDAR.

      • setBluetoothBytePacketSize

        public boolean setBluetoothBytePacketSize(int bluetoothBytePacketSize)
        Sets the size, in bytes, from which each chunk of data will be sent from the LIDAR to the phone. Returns true if successful. False if the value passed is not a factor of 42.
        Parameters:
        bluetoothBytePacketSize - The size, in bytes, of each chunk of data sent from the LIDAR.
        Returns:
        Success.

      • stopLIDAR

        public void stopLIDAR()
        Send a stop command to the LIDAR device. This will stop the LIDAR device from spinning and sending data.

      • startLIDAR

        public void startLIDAR()
        Start capturing data with the LIDAR device, reading from the bluetooth inputstream, and updating any output specified (logs, file, LidarDisplay).

      • connectToLIDAR

        public boolean connectToLIDAR()
        Attempts to connect to the LIDAR device and open a Bluetooth Socket. Returns true if successful, false if failed.
        Returns:
        Success.
